name: Rainbow Six Siege 2D
description:
I have been playing Rainbow Six Siege for a few months now and just thought it would be cool if it was made in 2D. Because of this, I spent about 2 weeks or so making this small prototype version. I am still working on this and there are some bugs that I will try to fix. 

*This is currently playable using only a Dualshock 4 (PS4) controller*
